Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps

Class SequentialGetStepSupplier<T,​R,​M,​P,​THIS extends SequentialGetStepSupplier<T,​R,​M,​P,​THIS>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.SequentialGetStepSupplier<T,​R,​M,​P,​THIS>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is a type of an input value
    R - is a type of a returned value
    M - is a type of a mediator value is used to get the required result
    P - is a type of a value checked by a Predicate.
    THIS - this is the self-type. It is used for the method chaining.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.function.Function<T,​R>>, StepParameterPojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetArrayChainedStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetArrayStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetIterableChainedStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetIterableStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetObjectChainedStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetObjectFromArrayChainedStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetObjectFromArrayStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetObjectFromIterableChainedStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetObjectFromIterableStepSupplier, SequentialGetStepSupplier.GetObjectStepSupplier
    public abstract class SequentialGetStepSupplier<T,​R,​M,​P,​THIS extends SequentialGetStepSupplier<T,​R,​M,​P,​THIS>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.function.Function<T,​R>>, StepParameterPojo
    This class is designed to build and to supply sequential functions to get desired value. There are protected methods to be overridden/re-used as public when it is necessary.

      • getParameters

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getParameters()
        Description copied from interface: StepParameterPojo
        Transforms an object to a map of step parameters and their values. It uses fields of type that extends StepParameterPojo or fields annotated by StepParameter
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface StepParameterPojo
        Returns:
        a map where key is a name of a parameter and value is a value of a parameter

      • criteria

        protected THIS criteria​(Criteria<? super P> criteria)
        Sometimes it is necessary to get a value that suits some criteria. This method adds the criteria to filter values. When this method and/or criteria(String, Predicate) are invoked previously then it joins conditions with 'AND'.
        Parameters:
        criteria - is the criteria to get required value

      • criteria

        protected THIS criteria​(java.lang.String description,
                        java.util.function.Predicate<? super P> predicate)
        Sometimes it is necessary to get a value that suits some criteria. This method adds the criteria to filter values. When this method and/or criteria(Criteria) are invoked previously then it joins conditions with 'AND'.
        Parameters:
        description - is a description of the criteria
        predicate - is the the criteria

      • timeOut

        protected THIS timeOut​(java.time.Duration timeOut)
        Sometimes it is necessary to wait until some result that may be considered valuable is returned. This method is for defining the waiting time.
        Parameters:
        timeOut - is a time duration to get desired value
        Returns:
        self-reference

      • pollingInterval

        protected THIS pollingInterval​(java.time.Duration pollingTime)
        Sometimes it is necessary to wait until some result that may be considered valuable is returned. It sets how often the function should be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        pollingTime - The timeout duration.
        Returns:
        A self reference.

        public THIS throwOnNoResult()
